page.title: 06PARENTS' VIEWS OF BRIDGEND
page.content: In our view Bridgend is an excellent place to live in.We live in Quarella Road,a residential street close to the town centre and opposite the Tesco store.We do not run a car but find shopping easy,and are within a few minutes walk of the bus and railway stations,where the services are regular and frequent.We have a family railcard.We enjoy walking,and Bridgend is close to open countryside and a relatively unspoilt coast.For short walks and games Newbridge Fields is ideal,only ten minutes walk.Bridgend is well off for facilities though it lacks a large up to date library and a swimming-pool.
